about_the_game:
Eons ago, a war among the Divines led to their fall, causing widespread suffering. Divine powers rained down upon the world, giving birth to the "Four Calamities" that continue to consume the world. Awakening in such collapse, how will you survive, and uncover the secrets hidden behind the war?

Struggling to survive on the land teetering on the brink of destruction.

Classic side-scrolling game levels, featuring over 10 brand-new pixel scenes, hundreds of maps, more than 20 distinctive bosses, and nearly a hundred types of monsters, offering you the ultimate enjoyment of exploration and combat.

Unleashing the power left behind by the gods.

A rich variety of abilities awaits you, with hundreds of distinct mechanics at your disposal. You can carry most of these abilities into battle, covering a wide range of skills including evasion, defense, aggressive attacks, aerial combat, summoning, and transformation. As you explore this land, you will acquire even more powerful abilities. When you can wield these abilities with agility and precision, perhaps you will become a true "new Divine."

Sprint: Swiftly shifting and dodging, moving and changing one's form shadow.

Raid: Relentlessly pursuing and fiercely attacking, never giving up until the end.

Defend: Blocking and countering, protected by a holy shield.

Treading: Three-dimensional mobility, ace aerial combat.

Other features are still under development, stay tuned~
